name: Bok Choy with Broccoli-Side
ingredients: 1 pound bok choy, about 1 medium bunch

instructions.en: Cut bok choy stalks into 1-inch pieces and coarsely chop the leaves
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte stonky bok choy na 2,5 cm kúsky a nahrubo nasekajte listy
instructions.ja: チンゲン菜の茎を2.5cm幅に切り、葉を粗みじん切りにする

instructions.en: Peel broccoli stalks and cut into 1/4-inch pieces. Cut florets into bite-size pieces
instructions.sk: Olúpte stonky brokolice a nakrájajte na 0,6 cm kúsky. Nakrájajte ružičky na kúsky veľkosti sústa
instructions.ja: ブロッコリーの茎の皮をむき、0.6cm幅に切る。小花を一口大に切る

instructions.en: In a large skillet or wok, bring 1/2 cup water to a boil. Add bok choy stalks, broccoli stalks and florets
instructions.sk: Vo veľkej panvici alebo woku priveďte 120 ml vody do varu. Pridajte stonky bok choy, stonky a ružičky brokolice
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンまたはワックで120mlの水を沸騰させる。チンゲン菜の茎、ブロッコリーの茎と小花を加える

instructions.en: Cover and simmer on medium-low heat until broccoli is bright green, about 5 minutes
instructions.sk: Prikryte a varte na stredne nízkom ohni, kým brokolica nezozelenie, asi 5 minút
instructions.ja: 蓋をして中火〜弱火で約5分、ブロッコリーが鮮やかな緑色になるまで煮る

instructions.en: Uncover and cook on high heat until water evaporates, 2-4 minutes
instructions.sk: Odkryte a varte na vysokom ohni, kým sa voda neodparí, 2-4 minúty
instructions.ja: 蓋を取り、強火で2〜4分、水分が蒸発するまで調理する

instructions.en: Remove from heat, add bok choy leaves, oil, and garlic. Return to heat and cook, stirring often, for 2 minutes
instructions.sk: Odstavte z ohňa, pridajte listy bok choy, olej a cesnak. Vráťte na oheň a varte za častého miešania 2 minúty
instructions.ja: 火を止め、チンゲン菜の葉、油、にんにくを加える。再び火にかけ、頻繁に混ぜながら2分間調理する

instructions.en: Add ginger and soy sauce, toss well
instructions.sk: Pridajte zázvor a sójovú omáčku, dobre premiešajte
instructions.ja: 生姜と醤油を加え、よく和える
